features: BaK-4 prisms for bright, clear, crisp viewing
Multi-coated optics for superior light transmission and brightness.

Waterproof/fogproof construction: Products are O-ring sealed and nitrogen purged for total waterproof and fogproof protection. These models can withstand complete immersion in water and stay dry inside. The interior optical surfaces won't fog due to rapid temperature change or humidity.
Non-slip rubber armor absorbs shock while providing a firm grip
Large center-focus knob for easy adjustments
